languages.text: "Пожалуй, угодное Императору решение. Кроме того, предположу, что похищений с целью выкупа станет на порядок меньше. Заседание объявляется закрытым!"
"This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй, угодное Императору решение. Кроме того, предположу, что похищений с целью выкупа станет на порядок меньше. Заседание объявляется закрытым!"

traits.locale_text: "This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Besides, I imagine it is going to make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"
"This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Besides, I imagine it is going to make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"
"This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"
"This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"
"This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"
"This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"

languages.text: "Das klingt nach einer Entscheidung ganz im Sinne des Imperators. Überdies dürften Entführungen dadurch deutlich seltener werden. Die Sitzung ist geschlossen."
languages.original_text: "This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: "Das klingt nach einer Entscheidung ganz im Sinne des Imperators. Überdies dürften Entführungen dadurch deutlich seltener werden. Die Sitzung ist geschlossen."

languages.text: « Voilà une décision qui me paraît conforme à la volonté de l'Empereur. Sans compter qu'elle contribuera sans doute à la raréfaction des affaires d'enlèvement contre rançon. Sur ce, la séance est close ! »
languages.original_text: "This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: « Voilà une décision qui me paraît conforme à la volonté de l'Empereur. Sans compter qu'elle contribuera sans doute à la raréfaction des affaires d'enlèvement contre rançon. Sur ce, la séance est close ! »

languages.text: “相信帝皇会认同这样的决定。除此之外，我认为这样一来，勒索赎金之类的绑架事件也会大大减少。本次审判到此结束！”
languages.original_text: "This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: “相信帝皇会认同这样的决定。除此之外，我认为这样一来，勒索赎金之类的绑架事件也会大大减少。本次审判到此结束！”

languages.text: «Esa decisión me resulta favorable a ojos del Emperador. Y, lo que es más, imagino que reducirá en gran medida los secuestros por dinero. ¡Se levanta la sesión!».
languages.original_text: "This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: «Esa decisión me resulta favorable a ojos del Emperador. Y, lo que es más, imagino que reducirá en gran medida los secuestros por dinero. ¡Se levanta la sesión!».

languages.text: 「これは皇帝の御心にも適う判断のように思えます。さらに言えば、身代金目的の誘拐も大幅に減ることでしょう。この審理はこれにて終了します！」
languages.original_text: "This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: 「これは皇帝の御心にも適う判断のように思えます。さらに言えば、身代金目的の誘拐も大幅に減ることでしょう。この審理はこれにて終了します！」

languages.text: "Bu, İmparator'un makul bulacağı türden bir karar. Dahası, fidye amaçlı kaçırma vakalarını da ciddi ölçüde azaltacağı kanaatindeyim. Duruşma bitmiştir!"
languages.original_text: "This sounds like a decision that is favourable in the eyes of the Emperor. Moreover, I imagine it will make kidnappings for ransom substantially rarer. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu, İmparator'un makul bulacağı türden bir karar. Dahası, fidye amaçlı kaçırma vakalarını da ciddi ölçüde azaltacağı kanaatindeyim. Duruşma bitmiştir!"
